org.hibernate.shards.query
Interface ShardedQuery

All Superinterfaces:
org.hibernate.Query
All Known Implementing Classes:
ShardedQueryImpl
public interface ShardedQuery
extends org.hibernate.Query

ShardedQuery extends the Query interface to provide the ability to query across shards.

Author:
Maulik Shah
See Also:
Query
